guide.introduction:
Using just a few ingredients, I'll teach you how to make Kryptonite candy that glows under UV light.

This project is originally by BrittLiv on Instructables.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Using just a few ingredients, I'll teach you how to make Kryptonite candy that glows under UV light.

This project is originally by BrittLiv on Instructables.

Relevant parts
  • Sugar
  • Quartz Crystals
  • Rice
  • Electric green food coloring
  • Your favorite flavoring
  • Vitamin B2 capsules
  • UV Flashlight
Tools
  • Candy thermometer
  • Ladle
  • Pan
  • Pot

lines.text: First gather your ingredients: sugar, electric green food coloring, your favorite flavored oil, and the magic touch, vitamin B<sub>2</sub> capsules to make them glow.
lines.text_raw: First gather your ingredients: sugar, electric green food coloring, your favorite flavored oil, and the magic touch, vitamin B,,2,, capsules to make them glow.

lines.text: To make the candy you'll also need a stove, pot, candy thermometer, aluminum foil, quartz crystals to make the molds with, and rice to hold up the molds.
lines.text_raw: To make the candy you'll also need a stove, pot, candy thermometer, aluminum foil, quartz crystals to make the molds with, and rice to hold up the molds.

lines.text: Before cooking, prepare your molds by covering the quartz crystals in aluminum foil, then carefully pulling the foil apart, leaving an impression.
lines.text_raw: Before cooking, prepare your molds by covering the quartz crystals in aluminum foil, then carefully pulling the foil apart, leaving an impression.

lines.text: You can also make long strips of candy by folding the foil lengthwise and curling up the ends so the candy doesn't leak out.
lines.text_raw: You can also make long strips of candy by folding the foil lengthwise and curling up the ends so the candy doesn't leak out.

lines.text: Set your molds into the pan of rice to maintain their shape.
lines.text_raw: Set your molds into the pan of rice to maintain their shape.

lines.text: Dissolve three capsules of vitamin B<sub>2</sub> in 150mL of water (5/8 cup), and measure out 1.25 cups of sugar.
lines.text_raw: Dissolve three capsules of vitamin B,,2,, in 150mL of water (5/8 cup), and measure out 1.25 cups of sugar.

lines.text: Using your candy thermometer, mix in the sugar and B<sub>2</sub>/water mix until the solution gets to 200 degrees. Then stop mixing and wait for the temperature to reach 300.
lines.text_raw: Using your candy thermometer, mix in the sugar and B,,2,,/water mix until the solution gets to 200 degrees. Then stop mixing and wait for the temperature to reach 300.

lines.text: Now it's time to work fast. Add your food coloring and flavoring and quickly stir, then start pouring your molds with a ladle.
lines.text_raw: Now it's time to work fast. Add your food coloring and flavoring and quickly stir, then start pouring your molds with a ladle.

lines.text: Wait until the candy has solidified, and carefully pull them from the molds.
lines.text_raw: Wait until the candy has solidified, and carefully pull them from the molds.

lines.text: Congratulations, you've made UV sensitive Kryptonite candy. Enjoy!
lines.text_raw: Congratulations, you've made UV sensitive Kryptonite candy. Enjoy!
